message_1: A message "MATHEMATICS IS COOL" was encrypted using a Transposition cipher where the letters were shifted 5 spaces to the right. What is the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "MATHEMATICS IS COOL" using a transposition cipher with a shift of 5 spaces to the right, we will replace each letter with the letter that is 5 positions later in the alphabet. If the shift goes beyond 'Z', it wraps around to 'A' again. Spaces and other non-letter characters remain unchanged.

M -> R
A -> F
T -> Y
H -> M
E -> J
M -> R
A -> F
T -> Y
I -> N
C -> H
S -> X

I -> N
S -> X

C -> H
O -> T
O -> T
L -> Q

The encrypted message is: "RFYJRFYX NH HTTQ"
